page.title: 06Catcott Burtle Farm
page.content: {Catcott Burtle Farm}stands round a corner next to the{Burtle Inn.}The people that live there now are Mr.and Mrs. Tucker before lived Mr. and Mrs. Freke.The Tuckers own 135 acres which is 24 and a half hectares they have 14 fields.They have 3 stables in which they keep 3{horses.}They have 70{cows} and 1{dog.}They have 10 different buildings on the farm.Only 1 has been destroyed and not replaced but 2 have been replaced.The only prize animals they have are horses.They take animals to sell at{Highbridge}market.They have 17 machines all together like tractors and trailers.Some buildings are older than the house.They have 13 rooms in the house and it was originally a farm.
